required_fields.description: What they sell - specific product/service details
required_fields.where_to_find: Homepage hero section, About page, Product page
required_fields.quality_standard: Must be 1-2 sentences with specific features mentioned
required_fields.example: AI code reviewer that automatically reviews PRs in GitHub with full codebase context, catching 3x more bugs

required_fields.quality_standard: The exact headline or primary value statement from the site

required_fields.description: Who is this for - specific buyer personas/industries
required_fields.where_to_find: Homepage 'Who is this for' section, case studies, customer logos
required_fields.quality_standard: Specific job titles or industries, not generic
required_fields.example: VP Engineering at DevTools startups, Engineering Managers at Series A companies

- 2x faster builds
- 75% cost reduction
- One-line integration

required_fields.description: How they charge - PLG vs enterprise, pricing page exists?
required_fields.quality_standard: PLG (self-serve) or Enterprise (contact sales) or Both

required_fields.description: Last 4-6 posts - topics, hiring mentions, pain points
required_fields.quality_standard: Summary of post themes with dates, mention hiring if present
required_fields.example: 1w ago: Hiring Founding AE ($280K-$360K). 2w ago: Product launch v3. 3w ago: Series A announcement
Ex-Google Search Infrastructure, Ex-Faire Engineering, University of Waterloo CS

required_fields.description: How founder describes the company on their profile
required_fields.quality_standard: The exact description from their current position
required_fields.example: Building AI code review platform that catches bugs 3x faster than manual review

required_fields.description: Communication style, MBTI indicators from posts
required_fields.quality_standard: Note: data-driven vs visionary, metrics-focused vs relationship-focused
required_fields.example: Data-driven (posts include metrics: '$10M ARR', '100K calls/day'), action-oriented language

required_fields.description: Active hiring posts, roles mentioned, urgency indicators
required_fields.quality_standard: Specific roles and timing if mentioned
required_fields.example: Hiring Founding AE (posted 1w ago), multiple eng roles (posted 2w ago)

required_fields.description: Product launches, version releases, feature announcements
required_fields.example: v3 launch (2w ago) - catching 3x more bugs. Integration with Stripe (1mo ago)

before_marking_complete.action: Review each field - no empty strings allowed for required fields
Review each field - minimum standard met
Website and LinkedIn URLs are valid and accessible

completion_criteria.website_research_complete: All 5 website fields filled with quality standards met
completion_criteria.linkedin_research_complete: All 6 LinkedIn fields filled with quality standards met
completion_criteria.company_research_complete: Both website AND LinkedIn research complete, validation checklist passed
